'''...You could hear Paimon all along, couldn't you?''' is an [[Achievement]] in the category ''[[Wonders of the World]]''. To complete this achievement, the player needs to adjust the dialogue volume in the [[Settings|audio settings]] until [[Paimon]] repeats herself four times.

==Voice-Overs==
{{Dialogue start}}
:{{A|vo vol paimon 01 a.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Paimon coming in, Paimon coming in! Is this level okay? Can you hear Paimon?
:{{A|vo vol paimon 01 b.ogg}} '''Paimon:''' Hey! Are you just messing with Paimon?
{{Dialogue end}}
